name: Alien Dog Evolution - Wild Stray Mutant Simulator
name_original: Alien Dog Evolution - Wild Stray Mutant Simulator
description:
•••••••••••Alien World ••••••••••••••


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
INSTRUCTION
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• Put same type dogs together to mutate new creatures
• Dogs poop can become coins and your money incoming
• Use dogs coins to buy new animals and new tools update
• You can also tap the dogs to make more coins
• Decorate you lovely dogs in fitting room
• Lucky draw by flip the card
• More features can let the mutations more fun


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• There are more than 30 dogs for you to discover
• This game is a similar game with alpaca evolution but more fun
• Different endings and possibility: find your own dog world to be special one than others
• Poop, get coins…. repeat and your will love it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dog evolution!!!
One day, some scientific experiments made those dogs start to mutate.
Would you like to know what mutations happening to them?
Combine dogs to evolve them and discover their most strange, fantastic and visionary forms!
You never seen so many mutations and crazy features in other games!
All the alpaca clicker type evolution, but happened on bad puppy.
Use your poop coins to evolution and mutations more puppy you will found the fun like alpaca clicker.
puppy evolve and mutant to another type puppy with fun coins clicker.
Little puppy mutant to big puppy, big puppy mutant to fly puppy… fly puppy mutant to alien puppy.
Mutant is the only thing, keep evolution, keep poop coins clicker.
It’s fun like other evolution game like alpaca evolution, rabbit evolution, dog evolution.
Mutations cost your poop coins, but new mutations brings more poop coins.
Maybe you ever played alpaca evolution, but that one have no poop coins and so much mutant dogs.
Alpaca clicker is fun, but not this type. dog evolution can let you forget other evolution games.
Keep mutant poop coins you will get that. dog evolution is so different than alpaca clicker.
Which one can keep you playing all the day? not alpaca clicker, it’s dog evolution.
Mutations is the only thing you need care. You only need to care mutations poop coins.
puppy are waiting mutations. Be a mutations clicker you will get all the puppy.
Use your finger, dog mutations by coins clicker. Easy to play if you ever play alpaca clicker.
So, let’s go, poop mutations, dog mutations!!!!!!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is a simulator dog world, think you are one dog or the god of dogs.

Disclaimer: Although this Game is free to play, some content can be purchased for real money in game. If you do not want to use these features, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.
